item.title: EA Sports FC 25: Best Sprint Supreme Evolution Players
item.description:
An injection of pace makes all the difference to a central defender in EA Sports FC 25 . With several strikers capable of brushing past defenders with ease, having defenders that have a chance of keeping up with them gives players the opportunity to prevent them from having a shot on target.

Most center backs in Ultimate Team aren't renowned for their blistering pace, but many do possess useful Player Roles that keep them in line when the pressure is high. Here, find the best Sprint Supreme Evolution players to enhance their pace on the pitch even further.

Best Supreme Sprint Evolution Players In EA Sports FC 25

Using the Supreme Sprint Evolution is the perfect way to inject some extra pace and sprint speed into a central defender that needs quicker movement on the pitch. This particular Evolution grants a CB with +10 Sprint Speed and +10 Acceleration, making any defender that meets the requirements extremely quick. Below are the requirements and upgrades on offer:

Requirements To Use Supreme Sprint Evolution

  • Overall : Maximum of 84
  • Position : CB

Best Upgrades For The Supreme Sprint Evolution

  • Sprint Speed : +10
  • Acceleration : +10

The table below includes some of the best options to use on the Supreme Sprint Evolution, detailing the player, ratings, price in coins, and key stats:

Player

Rating Before

Rating After

Price

Key Stats

Konate

83

83

24,000 Coins

  • Acceleration : 79 (+10)
  • Sprint Speed : 90 (+10)
  • Stopper +
  • Ball-Playing Defender +

Romero

84

84

1,300 Coins

  • Acceleration : 77 (+10)
  • Sprint Speed : 78 (+10)
  • Interceptions : 86
  • Defensive Awareness : 85

Koulibaly

84

84

1,300 Coins

  • Acceleration : 76 (+10)
  • Sprint Speed : 95 (+10)
  • Pace : 81 (+5 after Evolution)
  • Defender +

de Ligt

84

84

1,300 Coins

  • Acceleration : 64 (+10)
  • Sprint Speed : 78 (+10)
  • Stand Tackle : 85
  • Defensive Awareness : 85

Lisandro Martinez

84

84

1,200 Coins

  • Acceleration : 84 (+10)
  • Sprint Speed : 78 (+10)
  • Standing Tackle: 87
  • Defensive Awareness : 86

The better options primarily feature from t he Premier League, with players from Manchester United, Liverpool, and Tottenham Hotspur all proving popular options among players looking to build a versatile defense. For those looking outside of England's top division, Koulibaly is a strong choice due to his Saudi Pro League links to maximize chemistry.

Other choices include Ake from Manchester City and Bayern Munich's Upamecano, who is an already excellent defender without the Sprint Supreme Evolution.

The Sprint Supreme Evolution in EA Sports FC 25 provides players with plenty of great options, especially when it doesn't cost any coins or FC Points to complete. For those looking to upgrade a player without spending thousands, it's definitely worth completing this Evolution before it disappears.

item.title: FragPunk Reveals Beta Date and Two New Characters at Tokyo Game Show 2024
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • FragPunk's unique card-based mechanics offer variety and randomness that set it apart from other hero shooters.
  • The FragPunk closed beta will run from October 10-21, allowing more players access to the game across various platforms.
  • New playable characters like Sonar and Spider, along with strategic Shard Cards, add depth and complexity to FragPunk's gameplay.

The ongoing 2024 Tokyo Game Show had more to reveal about NetEase Games' upcoming hero shooter FragPunk , including the game's next closed beta test schedule. The FragPunk trailer also dropped info about new playable Shard Cards coming to the test, as well as two more playable characters.

Despite some fatigue in the gaming audience over the seeming glut of new hero shooters entering the market, FragPunk appears to be gathering some attention for its innovative card game-based mechanics. On top of the unique gimmicks each playable "Lancer" character can wield, FragPunk Shard Card abilities allow for a level of variety and randomness that might trump other games in the same genre. Some card powers range from relatively prosaic enhancements like incendiary ammunition to cards that can change the layout of the level, flipping areas over to deny enemies a terrain advantage. The system could help set FragPunk apart from its competition.

With a new trailer aired during TGS 2024, NetEase Games and developer Bad Guitar shed more light on the next FragPunk closed beta. According to a beta FAQ on the official website, the FragPunk closed beta will October 10, 2024, and run through October 21 on both PC via Steam and Xbox Series X|S. Players can sign up via Steam or the Xbox Insider Hub app on their respective platforms. The new closed beta test will be open to a wider swathe of players across more regions and languages, opening up the pool for more to enjoy. The team also outlined two new playable Lancers being added to the closed beta roster: Spider and Sonar.

FragPunk Closed Beta Trailer Details New Cards, Sonar and Spider Playable Heroes

The FragPunk closed beta trailer outlined a few new cards that underscore the strategic nature of the Shard Card system. Some cards can be countered by others, such as when the flashbang-like Flashlight card's screen-blanking effect is countered by the Safety Glasses card, which greatly reduces the effect and duration of such flash effects. Another card, Blade Master, can block bullets coming from the front, and in combination with the Turtleback card can offer nearly impenetrable defense from both front and back attacks.

The trailer also detailed two new playable Lancers: Sonar and Spider. With a marine animal-inspired design that also happens to make her look a bit like a World of Warcraft Draenei, Sonar can locate enemies and conceal her teammates by masking their movement noise. Spider seems to have the ability to warp himself or other players, giving him the ability to set up deadly traps and ambushes.

Despite its innovative mechanics and distinctive visual identity, FragPunk may have an uphill battle to gain attention against competitors saturating the hero shooter market of 2024. This year, players are practically swamped with high-quality hero shooters ranging from a resurgent Overwatch 2 , to brand-enhanced titles like Marvel Rivals, and heavily-backed favorites like Valorant . Time and testing will have to show whether FragPunk can gain the attention needed to sustain itself in the longer term.

item.title: All Elden Ring Bosses (& Best Main Boss Order)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Best Main Boss Order
  • All Elden Ring Bosses

Elden Ring is a fantasy action RPG featuring an open-world structure and challenging combat. It is a fast-paced game that offers players complete freedom and a variety of playstyles to choose from. Being one of the best FromSoftware games, Elden Ring features vast and immersive game worlds. These worlds are home to plenty of enemy bosses who won’t hesitate to kill anyone who crosses their paths.

These enemies range from mini Dungeon bosses to challenging World bosses and the most powerful Legacy Dungeon bosses. Even though there are hundreds of bosses in the game, players only need to defeat 12 Elden Ring bosses to complete the game. Each boss has unique weaknesses and resistance to different damage types and playstyles. This guide enlists all the bosses found in the diverse worlds of Elden Ring .

Updated on September 23, 2024, by Nahda Nabiilah: Tarnished will find an abundance of bosses while journeying in the Lands Between. Some are easy and don’t require much fighting, while others are extremely difficult and will make you rip your hair out. With that being said, it’s completely natural that the tougher bosses will have better rewards than the easy ones. There is actually a third type in Elden Ring and that is the Shardbearer bosses. They reward their remembrances, which allows you to exchange them with their weapons at the Roundtable Hold.

Best Main Boss Order

Needless to say, beating any boss can be hard and players may need to try a few times. However, tackling each boss according to their difficulty level can make overcoming them a bit more manageable. The main bosses that all players must defeat to reach any Elden Ring ending are listed below by their level of difficulty:

Location

item.title: How to Get the Beach Cave Heart Piece in Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom
item.description:
Collecting Heart Pieces is an age-old tradition in the Zelda franchise, and The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom carries the torch brilliantly into the future. From the moment Zelda is set loose into the open-world of Hyrule, she will begin to encounter Heart Pieces almost immediately. And while most of these health-expanding items can be found without many problems, there are a few that can be tricky to collect, even early-on. This guide will cover one such item, explaining how to get the Heart Piece in Beach Cave.

How to Get the Beach Cave Heart Piece

Suthorn Beach Cave:

If you missed the Heart Piece when you originally passed through Beach Cave, you can return to it by using the fast-travel to Suthorn Village, then heading west. It is the cave you have to cross through to get from the beach area to Suthorn Village . If you are coming from the west, you'll know you are entering the cave when you find the entrance blocked by several Sea Urchin enemies.

Boulder Echo:

You'll need to make sure you acquire the Boulder Echo to get this Heart Piece. There may be other heavy objects that can get the job done, but if you want to get the Heart Piece as early as possible, the Boulder is your best bet. Luckily, it is impossible to miss the location, you just need to make sure you learn the Echo.

As you leave Hyrule Castle for the first time, you'll enter a large hole in the ground to exit the courtyard. This will take you to a side-scrolling sequence with underwater sections. You'll encounter the Boulder blocking your path. Approach the rock and press ZR to learn the Echo.

Simply Smashing:

When you reach Beach Cave, you'll have to defeat a single Keese. Then, as you move ahead in the cave, you should be able to see the Heart Piece in a small chamber blocked off with wooden boxes. There is a higher platform that it seems like you will need to drop the Boulder from to break the boxes, but reaching the platform may stump you at first. With three available Echoes, it doesn't seem like reaching the platform is possible. That is, until you notice the obvious rock wall staring you in the face.

If you missed the climbable rock wall, don't worry, you aren't the only one. The game does not appear to offer any hint that the wall is climbable. But this is, in fact, how you reach the higher platform. Follow these steps to collect the Heart Piece:

  • Climb the rock wall to reach the higher platform
  • Create a Boulder Echo at the edge of the platform and let it drop to smash a box - it will only smash one.
  • Hold ZR to erase the Boulder, then drop another onto the next box.
  • Repeat the process to smash the third box.
  • The chamber is now accessible. Collect the Heart Piece.

Collecting four Heart Pieces will unlock a full Heart.

item.title: Crusader Kings 3: 10 Beginner Tips To Play As Unlanded Adventurer
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Upgrade Camp Facilities to boost resources and army strength for success.
  • Choose a Camp Purpose wisely; it affects gameplay, resources, and contracts.
  • Maintain Men-at-Arms troops and follow Major Adventure Decisions for effective progress.

One of the major innovations in the new Crusader Kings 3 DLC, Roads to Power , is the ability for players to choose to become Landless Adventurers, setting aside the traditional gameplay style for which the series is known. Now, it's possible to live the life of a mercenary or seize opportunities to conquer territories anew.

However, with the introduction of this new mode, which enhances role-playing possibilities and adds numerous new mechanics to explore, players familiar with Crusader Kings 3 will find assimilating these features into new gameplay sessions quite straightforward. Nevertheless, there are some Landless Adventurer tips that can make the start of a medieval adventure even more satisfying.

10 Focus On Camp Improvements

They Are Extremely Important For Landless Adventurers In Crusader Kings 3

Although players don't have access to traditional holdings when playing as Landless Adventurers in Crusader Kings 3 , they do have access to the Camp , which allows empty slots to be filled with a series of buildings that enhance the characters' resources. Therefore, it's crucial to allocate a good portion of the profits obtained from adventures to improve these camp facilities.

Through these constructions and camp upgrades, players will have the opportunity to recruit more soldiers and increase the strength of their own army. Additionally, they can improve other aspects of the game, such as safety during travels or resistance to diseases. Investing in the camp is an excellent way to ensure the longevity of all characters in Crusader Kings 3 .

9 Choose A Camp Purpose That Suits A Playstyle

This Decision Will Greatly Affect The Landless Adventurer Experience

Another important decision players need to make at the beginning of their journey as a Landless Adventurer in Crusader Kings 3 is selecting the Camp Purpose for their group. This choice influences various gameplay factors, since it alters some resources that may or may not be accessible throughout the journey.

For example, players who opt for the purpose "Become Swords-for-Hire" will gain access to new camp upgrades that unlock war-focused benefits, and contracts will become more combat-specific. There are other options available, including a more generic one for those who don't want anything too specific. Additionally, players can spend Prestige to change this at any time in Crusader Kings 3 .

8 Always Have Extra Provisions

Ensure That Characters Don't Go Hungry

While playing as nobles in Crusader Kings 3 , players don't need to think much about feeding their characters. However, this becomes an important mechanic for Landless Adventurers in the Roads to Power DLC . Those who choose this gameplay style will receive a new resource called Provisions, which is used to relocate the camp.

The amount of Provisions spent during relocation varies according to the army's size and how many followers the character has. It also depends on the chosen route to the new holding where the camp will be placed. Therefore, it's always a good idea to keep an eye out for contracts that offer this resource as a form of payment to avoid triggering detrimental events.

7 Have Good Officers In The Camp

Important For Long-Term Success

In conventional saves of Crusader Kings 3 , filling Court positions with good characters is already fundamental for long-term success. However, when playing as a Landless Adventurer, these roles become even more important. Here, they're called Officers , and they are a significant mechanic in the game.

Depending on the Camp Purpose, some new officer options may emerge, but maintaining followers who have good aptitude for their roles is crucial. They improve certain attributes of the main character and enhance performance in other activities, such as reducing travel time, making journeys faster and easier.

6 Pay Attention To Potential Rewards Of Each Contract

Maximize Gains By Choosing The Best Proposals

The early stages of the journey as a Landless Adventurer in Crusader Kings 3 can be somewhat slow, since the camp won't have enough power to engage in wars or fulfill more ambitious objectives, leaving only smaller contracts. Regardless of the mission type, it's always important to pay attention before accepting it.

Each contract in the game has specific objectives and utilizes certain attributes of the character. Therefore, accepting options that align best with the adventurer is the best choice to increase success chances and avoid risking dissatisfaction from contractors. This way, players can progress and gain even more reputation to unlock better contracts.

5 Move The Camp In Search Of New Opportunities

Don't Stay In Just One Place

As a Landless Adventurer in Crusader Kings 3 , players aren't required to stay in just one spot on the map throughout the character's life. On the contrary, there's the possibility to change the territory where the camp is positioned to seek new adventure opportunities.

So, once the contracts in a region are no longer interesting for players' adventurers, they can decide to embark on a journey to another area. However, before making this decision, it's important to ensure there are enough Provisions in the camp for the move. After that, players can set off in search of new opportunities and contracts.

4 Make Decisions That Increase The Character's Prestige

A Way To Secure Better Contracts As Landless Adventurers

Increasing the character's Prestige is crucial for those seeking success as a Landless Adventurer in Crusader Kings 3 . One of the main tips is to focus on contracts and decisions that boost this value as quickly as possible. This strengthens the group's reputation, allowing access to more advantageous opportunities during the adventure.

With elevated Prestige, the character attracts the attention of more influential nobles who offer more challenging and rewarding jobs. These higher-prestige contracts not only increase financial gains but also facilitate the group's ascent in the political scene, providing strategic advantages for future conquests.

3 Seek Opportunities To Get New Followers

Skilled Followers Are Important For Landless Adventurers

While exploring life as a Landless Adventurer in the Roads to Power DLC, players should aim to build a strong camp with followers who are skilled and capable of performing well as Officers. Therefore, it's important to stay alert for all possible opportunities to find new travel companions.

These opportunities arise via random events throughout the game, but some missions may allow players to recruit new followers in Crusader Kings 3 , even if it leaves some nobles dissatisfied. Lastly, during travels, players can select the option to Scout for Talent , searching for new followers along the way.

2 Focus On Men-At-Arms

They Are Even More Important In The Roads To Power DLC

Special troops, known as Men-at-Arms , are fundamental for Landless Adventures in Crusader Kings 3 . Without access to Levies, which, although weaker, increase the number of soldiers in wars, the emphasis should be on strengthening and improving Men-at-Arms. Investing in buildings that enhance these troops ensures greater efficiency in battles.

Men-at-Arms require Provisions or financial resources to be replenished, unlike noble troops that renew automatically. For those who opt for a warlike path, it's essential to guarantee the constant supply of these units. This way, player maintain military strength ready to face challenges and conquer new territories in the Roads to Power DLC .

1 Follow The Major Adventure Decisions

A Good Guide On How To Proceed As A Landless Adventurer

The game introduces new special decisions for adventurers, making it easier to start a journey as a Landless Adventurer in Crusader Kings 3 . These decisions offer clear objectives that guide players, helping to map out the next steps based on the specific requirements of each choice, promoting more directed and efficient progress.

For those who feel overwhelmed by the numerous opportunities available, the Major Adventure Decisions are ideal for setting a final goal. By following these directions, it is possible to maximize the chances of success and better enjoy the game's mechanics, ensuring a more satisfying and structured experience during an adventure in the Roads to Power DLC.
